name: mat-block
flavor_text: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.
effect_text_extend: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
effect_text_simple: Protects all friendly Pokémon from damaging moves.  Only works on the first turn after the user is sent out.
